meanings: (good) luck, good fortune, lucky break, piece of luck

vlive.korean: "행운부적에 돼지 그림은 누가 그린 거예요?" "Who drew the pig on the lucky charm?" 듣기 View video Dispatch : 트와이스 ‘디아이콘’ 언박싱🐰🐹🦅
vlive.english: "Who drew the pig on the lucky charm?"

vlive.korean: 사람이 있었더라면 그 사람은 정말 행운인 거네? If someone watched, then that person was really lucky, right? 듣기 View video TWICE : ㅁㅁㄹ🧸
vlive.english: If someone watched, then that person was really lucky, right?

vlive.korean: 이렇게 나에게 행운이 와도 돼? Is it OK for me to be so lucky? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 우당탕식스의 (..버퍼링 중입니다..) 오째 생일파티🦀🎉 (HAPPY DAEHWI DAY!)
vlive.english: Is it OK for me to be so lucky?

vlive.korean: [이런 행운=게딱지장 지금 이런 행운이 다 대휘 거 같고 그렇죠] 너무 맛있겠죠? [Luck = crab shell, Seems like all this luck is yours] Doesn't it look absolutely delicious? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 우당탕식스의 (..버퍼링 중입니다..) 오째 생일파티🦀🎉 (HAPPY DAEHWI DAY!)
vlive.english: [Luck = crab shell, Seems like all this luck is yours] Doesn't it look absolutely delicious?

vlive.korean: 어허, 어허, 행운을 빌어요! Uh-huh, uh-huh. Good luck! 듣기 View video BTS : 진짜 오랜만 🤣🤣
